channel.title: CVE Feed for Kastle Systems -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Kastle Systems -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-45861|2024-09-20T13:05:06.549Z -- kastle%20systems -- access%20control%20system
item.description: Kastle Systems firmware prior to May 1, 2024, contained a hard-coded credential, which if accessed may allow an attacker to access sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2024-45862|2024-09-20T13:03:08.919Z -- kastle%20systems -- access%20control%20system
item.description: Kastle Systems firmware prior to May 1, 2024, stored machine credentials in cleartext, which may allow an attacker to access sensitive information.
